sen.j: 家子（いえのこ）とは、武士団の構成員。
sen.e: Ienoko are constituent members of bushidan (warrior bands).
Ienoko are constituent members of bushidan (warrior bands).
Ienoko are constituent members of bushidan (warrior bands).

sen.j: 武士団の構成員のうち惣領と血縁関係がある分家や庶子。
sen.e: They are branch family members and child born out of wedlock who had blood relationship with soryo (heir) among the members of bushidan.
They are branch family members and child born out of wedlock who had blood relationship with soryo (heir) among the members of bushidan.
They are branch family members and child born out of wedlock who had blood relationship with soryo (heir) among the members of bushidan.

sen.j: 血縁関係が無い有力な配下の場合もある。
sen.e: They are sometimes influential vassals without blood relationship.
They are sometimes influential vassals without blood relationship.
They are sometimes influential vassals without blood relationship.
